# UIPreviewAction.Style.selected

**Case**

The style for a selected peek quick action.

## Declaration

```swift
case selected
```

## Discussion

Use this style for the initially-selected item within a disclosed peek quick action group.

## Constants

- **UIPreviewAction.Style.default**: The default style.
- **UIPreviewAction.Style.destructive**: The style for a peek quick action that changes or deletes data.

items.description: The style for a peek quick action that changes or deletes data.
items.name: UIPreviewAction.Style.destructive
